Text:
For the people that like the book in 1 pdf-file:

1. Download "pdftk" (search for it on Google) to the directory where your single-page files are.

2. Open a command prompt (cmd.exe on Windows) and change directory to the directory where your pdf's are.

3. Enter "pdftk *.pdf cat output Art_of_Joinery.pdf" (without the quotes).

Done.

Thanks for the tip. Took the liberty of compiling all these into 1 pdf...

https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6190272
